wikipedia_page.main: Lee Steve Jackson (born 20 April 1980) is an English former biathlete.

Great Britain at the 2010 Winter Olympics
response: Britain sent a single biathlete to the Games; Lee-Steve Jackson was the first British competitor to qualify for the Olympic pursuit and finished in 56th position. He also took part in the individual and sprint events.
